data.title: An Online Business Service from the Office of the Secretary of State
data.text:
Latest Updates

August 21, 2024: LegalEase® payment option being discontinued

The Office of the Texas Secretary of State has recently been informed by Frost Bank that they will discontinue their LegalEase® payment product - a deposit account system administered by Frost Bank. As a result, beginning October 1, 2024, LegalEase® will no longer be accepted as a payment option for our agency’s services in SOSDirect. We will continue to process any paper submissions we receive with LegalEase® payment up until Frost’s processing deadline of October 31, 2024. For LegalEase® customer or service-related questions, please contact Frost Treasury Management Customer Service at (888) 481-0336.

July 19, 2024: SOS Client accounts are changing

Registered trademarks and service marks are no longer searchable in SOSDirect as all related services have moved completely to the new SOSPortal.
